cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1596, Commission on Equity and Reconciliation in the Uniformed Services Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 40 (Wednesday, March 3, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H1081-H1082]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TAKANO:
H.R. 1596.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H1082]]
Article 1, Section 8.

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 18 - 10.

title: Commission to Study the Stigmatization, Criminalization, and Ongoing Exclusion and Inequity for LGBTQ Servicemembers and Veterans Act
